passages.text:
The goverment wins this fight.
You've been being listened in on this whole time.
 YOU GET SWATTED 
A bunch of S.W.A.T members break down your doors.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: BIG BAD END 4

passages.text:
Enjoy making bombs. That's it, that's the end, good luck.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: BAD ENDING 8 CATASTROPHIC

passages.text:
You almost made it, you almost didn't 
    GET SWATTED 
THEY BUST DOWN YOUR FRONT DOOR
CLIMB OUT OF YOUR TOILET IN SCUBA GEAR
THEY WILL GET YOU

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: BIG BAD END 4

passages.text:
As the words leave you lips you notice a laser on your chest, and hear a loud bang from your front door, a S.W.A.T. team has broken into your apartment. 

 YOU HAVE BEEN SWATTED 

Bad End 1 Rip Bozo

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 1

passages.text:
Why did you buy napalm? You accidentally ignite it and die, game over.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 2

passages.text:
The water in your apartment is contaminated with arsnic, hope you enjoy throwing up till you die. The Swat agents listening in shrug, to them you're just another potential terrorist taken care of.

Remember to pay attention to your water supply, weird smells and strange apearances are important to take care of.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 4

passages.text:
You shouldn't have taken your guns to the club.
The police have caught up to you, you are surrounded.
Make better life choices pal.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End 9

passages.text:
A message appears on your screen from an unknown source
"I agree man but you shouldn't of said that out loud."

You barely have to time read that message before 
 YOU GOT SWATTED 
THE TEAM BREAKS THROUGH YOUR WINDOWS
YOUR LANDLORD WILL CHARGE FOR THOSE
LOST YOUR DEPOSIT AND GOING TO JAIL


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad End Landlords

passages.text:
WHY WOULD YOU SAY THAT ONLINE ANYWHERE???

 GET SWATTED 


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad Ending 6

passages.text:
You live out your days as a cat boy content creator, this could be considered a good ending.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad Ending 7

passages.text:
The weekend really was killer, with survival gear in tow you head out on a mission. Unfortunatly the agents listening in knew you plan.
 YOU GOT SWATTED 
SWAT MEMBERS ARE COMING OUT THE WOOD WORKS,
GUNS EVERYWHERE, YOU HAVE DIED.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad end 3

passages.text:
COCAINE IS BAD THE CONTRABAND WILL BE COLLECTED
 YOU GOT SWATTED 
Agents start coming through your windows! Red lasers are everywhere!
You barely manage to snort a bag of coke before you're getting tackled!

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Bad end funny alt lvl4

passages.text:
This is it, the revolution begins with you. You said all the right things and made all the right moves.

GG Pro gamer skills

Enjoy your community living in the woods.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Best Ending

passages.text:
A Bad Choice ends the game they get SWATTED
A Neutral choice from any path moves them to the Neutral Prompts
A Good Choice Moves them to the next Good Prompt

Rules:
Prompts can have up to 80 characters.
Answers can have up to 25 characters.


Bad ends            4 /16
Easter Egg Ends      2/3

Neutral choices   2/12
Neutral prompts   4/4
Neutral ends          2/4

Good options        0/9    
Good prompts      3/4
Good Ends             1/4

Prompt one:  COMPLETE
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 1
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 2
B1 N2 G1

Neutral prompt 3
B1 N2 G1

Neutral Prompt 4
B2 N1 G1


Good Prompt 1
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 2
B2 N1 G1

Good Prompt 3 
B3 N1 G1

Good Prompt 4
B3 N1 G1
passages.name: Developer notes

passages.text:
You were a spy all along and can't risk them hearing what you need to say. By not taking this call though you can't pass on any information to the other agent, you have been fired.

Game over agent.


[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Easter egg End 1 Declined Call

passages.text:
With silly straw in hand and vomit on your lips, that terrible stomach ache has gotten worse. You realize too late you have been drinking the tap water in your apartment, the tap water full of ARSENIC.

Death by water.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Easter eggs end 2 Arsenic

passages.text:
"It sucked that I was late for work because _____."

[[bad life choices lead you here ->Bad end 3]] 

[[Learn to do better ->Neutral Prompt 2]] 

[[stummy ache ;-; ->Egg Hunt 2 Arsnic]] 

[[Look a good choice for once in you life ->Good Prompt 3]]

links.name: bad life choices lead you here
Look a good choice for once in you life

passages.name: Egg Hunt 1 Arsnic

passages.text:
"Anyway I found _______ in my apartment."

[[Six pounds of cocaine ->Bad end funny alt lvl4]]

[[arsnic ->Easter eggs end 2 Arsenic]]

[[my old sticker collection ->Neutral prompt 4 Final]] 

[[the rent check I lost ->Good Prompt 4 Final]]
passages.name: Egg Hunt 2 Arsnic

passages.text:
"After losing my lighter I had to pick up a new one, I also picked up _____ at the store."

[[napalm->Bad End 2]] 

[[a new bandana ->Neutral Prompt 2]] 

[[silly straws ->Egg Hunt 1 Arsnic]] 

[[a multi-tool with a knife ->Good prompt 2]]
passages.name: Good Prompt 1

passages.text:
"I can't wait to leave, my neighbors started a fire outside the apartment, I still see it from my window, I need to _____ after this."

[[terrorize my insurance ->BIG BAD END 4]] 

[[really party ->Bad end funny alt lvl4]] 

[[fight the goverment -> BIG BAD END 4]] 

[[move to the woods ->Good Prompt 4 Final]]
passages.name: Good Prompt 3

passages.text:
"I've been considering starting _____"

[[the revolution->Bad Ending 6]]

[[an Only Furries->Bad Ending 7]]

[[a bomb making factory ->BAD ENDING 8 CATASTROPHIC]]

[[community garden ->Good turned Neutral Ending]]

[[homestead in the woods ->Best Ending]]
passages.name: Good Prompt 4 Final

passages.text:
You are somewhat problematic for the agents listening in, but you haven't said anything they could really consider a threat. You continue to be monitored but nothing changes.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Good ending 1

passages.text:
"I'm going camping soon to test my survival skills, I have a ____ coming up."

[[killer weekend ->Bad end 3]] 

[[hiking trip ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[scouts test ->Neutral Prompt 3]] 

[[hunting trip ->Good Prompt 3]]
passages.name: Good prompt 2

passages.text:
You live out the rest of your days growing turnips enjoy.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
passages.name: Good turned Neutral Ending

passages.text:
Your life is fairly boring and safe, you just chat with your friend and vent about a few things. You never even notice when they eventually take bugs out of your apartment as they mark you down as not a threat.

[[Loop to start? ->Terms and Serives]]
